name: Carrots Carnival (secret santa game jam)
description:
Rabbit is running away ! Run as fast as possible to save her.

But you'll have to cross waters, plains, music festivals... and even some strange milky/chocolate mixture. Change your clothes every time you need to run through a new area !

This is my first mini game ever as a programmer. The Carrots Carnival was made for the Secret Santa Game Jam, based upon the letter my giftee wrote (hi, Ben !).
